doc:
Elspeth Ballantyne https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elspeth_Ballantyne 0 Elspeth Ballantyne (born 20 April 1939) is a former Australian actress, who appeared in productions over a career that spanned some 50 years. She is perhaps best known for her soap opera roles as compassionate prison officer Meg Jackson (later Meg Morris) in Prisoner (1979–86), better known as Prisoner: Cell Block H in the USA and UK, and as coffee shop owner Cathy Alessi in Neighbours (1992–93). Elspeth_Ballantyne ( born 20_April_1939 ) is a_former_Australian_actress , who appeared in productions over a_career that spanned some_50_years .
